name: nakhrali-fashion
description: Complete e-commerce platform for ethnic jewelry

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && flask db upgrade && flask seed-db
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf venv

author: Nakhrali Fashion
